nodes.text: Rhilithan was a lifeless planet located within the Indrexu sector of the Outer Rim Territories.

This world was located along the Perlemian Trade Route between Varl and Nal Hutta, and was used as a waypoint for the transport ships that were working for Mika the Hutt, transporting spice to and from Varl following the end of the Galactic Civil War.
